extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: 1 bifolio = Poṉṉilakkam: Invocation. No foliation. Verso blank.
4 bifolios = Poṉṉilakkam: Text. No foliation. f[4]v blank.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Not dated by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not later than first mention in a catalogue.

provenance.p:
Most probably a manuscript owned by Reydellet as indicated by the shelfmark in black ink N° 23. bis. (Indien 434b, U4, f[2]v), which most probably refers to the number in Velanguani Arokium's catalogue (1845), first numbered list (f. 4r, nos. 15, 22 et 23).
See items 26 and 27 (Arithmetique) in Liste des manuscrits Tamouls donnés à la Bibliothèque du Roi par M. Reydelet (NAF 5441, f311v).

acquisition.p: Received, May 27th, 1833, from Reydellet (officier de marine en retraite au Havre). See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1, nos. 49-50 (Arithmétique, Fractions).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 62, no. 434.
Velanguani Arokium (Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam). 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. Manuscript, BnF NAF 5443. — See f. 4r, nos. 15, 22 et 23.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 99r, no. 402 434.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
